updates.caption: Posodobitve

repairs.caption: Popravila

repairs.no_repairs: Trenutno ni na voljo nobenih popravil

dialog.title: Popravila
dialog.breaks_in_version: To v verziji {version} ne bo več delovalo. Prosimo, uredite pred nadgradnjo.
dialog.ignored_in_version: Ta težava je bila prezrta v verziji {version}.

areas.caption: Območja
areas.description: Združevanje naprav in entitet v območja

picker.introduction: Področja se uporabljajo za organizacijo področja naprav. Te informacije bodo uporabljene v celotnem Home Assistant-u in vam bodo pomagale pri organizaciji vašega vmesnika, dovoljenj in integracij z drugimi sistemi.
picker.introduction2: Če želite napravo postaviti na neko območje, uporabite spodnjo povezavo, da odprete stran za integracije, nato pa kliknite na nastavljeno integracijo, da pridete do kartic naprave.
picker.no_areas: Videti je, da še nimate območij!

editor.name: Naziv
editor.no_linked_entities: S tem področjem ni povezanih entitet.
editor.aliases_description: Aliases are alternative names used in voice assistants to refer to this area.

delete.confirmation_text: To območje bo trajno izbrisano in vse naprave, ki pripadajo temu območju, bodo postale nedodeljene.

backup.caption: Varnostne kopije
backup.description_no_backup: Upravljaj varnostne kopije in povrni Homeassistant v prejšnje stanje
backup.name: Ime varnostne kopije

create.title: Ustvari varnostno kopijo
create.description: Ustvari varnostno kopijo trenutne mape s konfiguracijo, to bo trajalo nekaj časa.

remove.title: Izbriši varnostno kopijo
remove.description: Si prepričan, da želiš izbrisati varnostno kopijo z imenom {name}?

tag.caption: Značke
tag.description: Sproži avtomatizacije z NFC oznako, QR kodo itd
tag.confirm_remove: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti oznako {tag} ?

detail.name: Naziv
detail.usage: Značka lahko sproži avtomatizacijo, ko je prebrana. Uporabite lahko značke NFC, QR kode ali katero koli drugo vrsto. Uporabite našo {companion_link} da to značko zapišete v programabilno oznako NFC ali spodaj ustvarite kodo QR.

energy.caption: Energija
energy.new_device_info: Po nastavitvi nove naprave lahko traja do 2 uri, da novi podatki prispejo na vašo energetsko nadzorno ploščo.
energy.delete_source: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati ta vir?
energy.delete_integration: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati to integracijo? Odstranil bo entitete, ki jih zagotavlja

grid.title: Električno omrežje
grid.sub: Konfigurirajte količino energije, ki jo porabite iz omrežja, in če jo proizvedete, ki jo vrnete v omrežje. Home Assistant omogoča spremljanje vaše celovite porabe energije doma.
grid.learn_more: Več informacij o tem, kako začeti.

from.paragraph: Poraba omrežja je energija, ki se pretoči iz omrežja v vaš dom.
from.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures grid consumption in either of {unit}.
from.cost_para: Select how NDX Tech should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
from.cost_stat: Uporaba entitete, ki spremlja skupne stroške

to.paragraph: Proizvodnja v omrežje je energija, ki se izvaših sončnih kolektorjev pretaka v električno omrežje.
to.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures grid production in either of {unit}.
to.cost_para: Ali dobite denar nazaj, ko vrnete energijo v omrežje?
to.cost_stat: Uporabite entiteto, ki sledi skupnemu znesku prejetega denarja.

solar.title: Sončni kolektorji
solar.sub: Dovolite da Home Assistant spremlja vaše sončne kolektorje in vam omogoči vpogled v njihovo delovanje.
solar.learn_more: Več informacij o tem, kako začeti.

dialog.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures solar energy production in either of {unit}.
dialog.solar_production_forecast_description: Če dodate informacije o napovedi sončne proizvodnje, boste lahko hitro videli pričakovano proizvodnjo za danes.

battery.title: Domača shramba za baterije
battery.sub: Če imate baterijski sistem, ga lahko konfigurirate tako, da spremljate koliko energije je bilo shranjene oz. porabljene.
battery.learn_more: Več informacij o tem, kako začeti.

dialog.entity_para: Pick sensors which measure energy going in to and out of the battery in either of {unit}.

gas.title: Poraba plina
gas.sub: Naj Home Assistant spremlja vašo porabo plina.
gas.learn_more: Več informacij o tem, kako začeti.

dialog.paragraph: Poraba plina je količina plina, ki priteče v vaš dom.
dialog.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures gas consumption in either of {unit}.
dialog.note_para: Note: It is not possible to add both sensors measuring a volume of gas and sensors measuring the amount of energy contained in the gas.
dialog.cost_para: Izberite, kako naj Homeassistant spremlja stroške porabljene energije.
dialog.cost_stat: Uporaba entitete, ki spremlja skupne stroške

water.title: Poraba vode
water.sub: Naj Home Assistant spremlja vašo porabo vode.
water.learn_more: Več informacij o tem, kako začeti.

dialog.paragraph: Poraba vode je količina vode, ki priteče v vaš dom.
dialog.entity_para: Pick a sensor which measures water consumption in either of {unit}.
dialog.cost_para: Izberite, kako naj Home Assistant beleži stroške porabljene vode.
dialog.cost_stat: Uporaba entitete, ki spremlja skupne stroške

device_consumption.title: Posamezne naprave
device_consumption.sub: Sledenje porabi energije posameznih naprav omogoča Home Assistantu, da razčleni vašo porabo energije glede na napravo.
device_consumption.learn_more: Več informacij o tem, kako začeti.
device_consumption.add_stat: Pick entity to track energy of

dialog.selected_stat_intro: Izberite senzor energije, ki meri porabo energije naprave v kateri koli od {unit}.

helpers.caption: Pomočniki
helpers.description: Upravljanje elementov, s katerimi si lahko pomagate pri gradnji avtomatizacij.

picker.no_helpers: Zdi se, da še nimate pomočnikov!

core.caption: Splošno
core.description: Nazivi, časovni pas in druge lokalne nastavitve

core_config.edit_requires_storage: Urejevalnik je onemogočen, ker so nastavitve shranjene v configuration.yaml.
core_config.edit_location_description: Lokacijo je možno spremeniti v nastavitvah cone
core_config.update_units_label: Update the unit of all sensors
core_config.update_units_text_1: The unit system has been changed, and the unit of some sensors like distance and speed can be updated.
core_config.update_units_text_2: The unit of sensors where the unit has been edited from the UI or which can't be edited from the UI will not be updated.
core_config.update_units_text_3: Note: The unit of temperature sensors is always updated.
core_config.update_units_confirm_title: The unit of sensors will be updated
core_config.update_units_confirm_text: The unit system has been changed, and the unit of some sensors like distance and speed will be updated.

url.caption: URL Home Assistant
url.description: Določite kateri spletni naslov naj Homeassistant deli z drugimi napravami ob komunikaciji (npr. text-to-speech ali drugi mediji)
url.external_get_ha_cloud: Dostopajte od koderkoli, preprosto dodajte Google in Alexo
url.ha_cloud_remote_not_enabled: Vaša oddaljena povezava Home Assistant Cloud trenutno ni omogočena.
url.internal_url_https_error_description: V programu Home Assistant ste konfigurirali potrdilo HTTPS. To pomeni, da mora biti vaš notranji naslov URL nastavljen na domeno, ki jo pokriva certifikat.

hardware.description: Konfiguriraj vozlišča in priključeno strojno opremo

available_hardware.failed_to_get: Napaka pri pridobivanju seznama strojne opreme
available_hardware.title: Vsa strojna oprema

hardware.reboot_moved_title: Ponovni zagon in zaustavitev sta se premaknila
hardware.reboot_moved_description: Dejanje ponovnega zagona in zaustavitve sta bila premaknjena na sistemsko stran.
hardware.documentation_description: Poiščite dodatne informacije o svoji napravi

info.caption: Info

info.system_health_error: Komponenta "system health" ni naložena. Dodajte "system_health:" v svoj configuration.yaml

logs.caption: Dnevniki
logs.description: Oglejte si dnevnike in diagnosticirajte težave
logs.no_issues_search: Za iskalni niz ni bilo najdenih nobenih vnosov ''{term}''
logs.multiple_messages: sporočilo se je prvič pojavilo ob {time} in se prikaže {counter} krat
logs.provider_not_available: Logs for ''{provider}'' are not available on your system.

lovelace.caption: Nadzorne plošče
lovelace.description: Ustvarjajte prilagojene kartice za nadzor vašega doma

dashboards.caption: Nadzorne plošče

dialog_new.create_empty_description: Start with an empty dashboard from scratch
dialog_new.default_description: Display your devices grouped by area

dashboards.cant_edit_yaml: Nadzornih plošč, definiranih v YAML, ni mogoče urejati iz uporabniškega vmesnika. Spremenite jih v configuration.yaml.
dashboards.cant_edit_default: Standardne nadzorne plošče Lovelace ni mogoče urejati iz uporabniškega vmesnika. Lahko jo skrijete tako, da kot privzeto nastavite drugo nadzorno ploščo.

detail.title: Naslov
detail.url_error_msg: URL mora vsebovati - in ne sme vsebovati presledkov ali posebnih znakov, razen za _ in -
detail.set_default: Nastavi kot privzeto na tej napravi
detail.remove_default: Odstrani kot privzeto v tej napravi

resources.caption: Viri
resources.unavailable_safe_mode: Resources are not available in safe mode
resources.refresh_body: Če želite dokončati odstranitev, morate osvežiti stran. Jo morda želite osvežiti zdaj?
resources.cant_edit_yaml: Lovelace uporabljate v načinu YAML, zato ne morete upravljati svojih virov prek uporabniškega vmesnika. Upravljajte jih v configuration.yaml.

detail.warning_text: Dodajanje virov je lahko nevarno, prepričajte se, da poznate vir vira in jim zaupate. Slabi viri lahko resno škodijo vašemu sistemu.

config.title: Configuration
config.description: Give your assistant a name and select your language. Depending on this language, you may be able to choose region specific variants below.

conversation.title: Conversation agent
conversation.description: The conversation agent is the brains of your assistant and will process the incoming text commands.

stt.title: Speech-to-text
stt.description: When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the speech-to-text engine turns your voice command into text.

tts.title: Text-to-speech
tts.description: When you are controlling your assistant with voice, the text-to-speech engine turns the conversation text responses into audio.

wakeword.title: Wake word
wakeword.description: If a device supports wake words, you can activate Assist by saying this word.
wakeword.no_wake_words: It looks like you don't have a wake word engine setup yet.
wakeword.no_wake_words_link: Find out more about wake words.

detail.no_cloud_message: You should have an active cloud subscription to use cloud speech services.

assistants.title: Google Assistant in Amazon Alexa
assistants.text: Nadzirajte vse svoje naprave Home Assistant prek katere koli naprave, ki jo podpira Google Assistant ali Alexa.

speech.title: Neverjetne govorne možnosti za Assist
speech.text: Vnesite osebnost v svoj dom tako, da govori z vami z uporabo storitve govora v besedilo in besedila v govor, katere poganja naša nevronska mreža.

expose.caption: Izpostavite
expose.manually_configured: Configured in YAML, not editable in UI

automation.caption: Avtomatizacije
automation.description: Ustvarite pravila obnašanja po meri za svoj dom

picker.introduction: Urejevalnik za avtomatizacijo vam omogoča ustvarjanje in urejanje avtomatizacij. Prosimo, da preberete navodila spodaj, da preverite, ali ste pravilno nastavili Home Assistant.
picker.only_editable: Urejajo se lahko samo avtomatizacije, definirane v automations.yaml.
picker.dev_only_editable: Samo avtomatizacije, ki imajo dodeljen edinstven ID, je možno razhroščevati.
picker.traces_not_available: Avtomatizacije potrebujejo ID za sledenje zgodovini. Svoji avtomatizaciji dodajte ID, da bo na voljo v sledenju.
picker.empty_text_1: Automations make NDX Tech automatically respond to things happening in and around your home.
picker.empty_text_2: Automations connect triggers to actions in a ''when trigger then action'' fashion with optional conditions. For example: ''When the sun sets and if {user} is home, then turn on the lights''.

dialog_new.create_empty_description: Začnite s prazno avtomatizacijo od začetka

editor.read_only: Te avtomatizacije ni mogoče spremeniti v uporabniškem omrežju, ker ni shranjena v datoteki automations.yaml, ali pa nima določenega ID.
editor.missing_name: Cannot save automation without a name
editor.traces_not_available: Avtomatizacije potrebujejo ID za sledenje zgodovini. Svoji avtomatizaciji dodajte ID, da bo na voljo v sledenju.
editor.load_error_not_editable: Urejati je mogoče le avtomatizacije v automations.yaml.
editor.load_error_not_deletable: Only automations in automations.yaml can be deleted.

triggers.name: Triggers
triggers.description: This list of triggers is what starts your automation. A trigger is a specific event happening in or around your home, for example: ''When the sun sets''.
triggers.unsupported_platform: Brez podpore za UI za platformo: {platform}

entity.label: Entity
entity.description: When something happens to an entity.

time_location.label: Time and location
time_location.description: When someone enters or leaves a zone, or at a specific time.

description.picker: When a calendar event starts or ends.
When something happens to a device. Great way to start.

event.label: Dogodek
event.context_users: Omeji na dogodke, ki jih sproži

description.picker: When an event is being received (event is an advanced concept in NDX Tech).
description.full: When {eventTypes} event is fired

description.picker: When an entity created by a geolocation platform appears in or disappears from a zone.
When the state of an entity (or attribute) changes.
When NDX Tech starts up or shuts down.
When a specific message is received on a given MQTT topic.
description.full: When an MQTT message has been received

description.picker: When the numeric value of an entity''s state (or attribute''s value) crosses a given threshold.
When a persistent notification is added or removed.
description.full: When a persistent notification is updated

description.picker: When the sun sets or rises.

conversation.label: Sentence
conversation.no_punctuation: You should not use punctuation in your sentence
conversation.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this sentence?

description.picker: When Assist matches a sentence from a voice assistant.
description.full: When the sentence {sentence} is said

description.picker: When a tag is scanned (tags are usually created from the companion app).
description.full: When a tag is scanned

description.picker: When a template evaluates to true.
At a specific time, or on a specific date.
description.full: When the time is equal to {time}

description.picker: Periodically, at a defined interval.

webhook.label: Webhook
webhook.local_only: Only accessible from the local network
webhook.webhook_id_helper: S tem identifikatorjem ravnajte kot z geslom: ohranite ga v tajnosti in poskrbite, da ga je težko uganiti.

description.picker: When NDX Tech receives a web request to the webhook endpoint.
description.full: When a Webhook payload has been received

description.picker: When someone (or something) enters or leaves a zone.

conditions.name: Conditions
conditions.description: This list of conditions needs to be satisfied for the automation to run. A condition can be satisfied or not at any given time, for example: ''If {user} is home''. You can use building blocks to create more complex conditions.

entity.label: Entity
entity.description: If an entity is in a specific state.

time_location.label: Time and location
time_location.description: If someone is in a zone or if the current time is before or after a specified time.

description.picker: Test if multiple conditions are true.
Set of conditions provided by your device. Great way to start.
Test if a condition is not true.
description.one_condition: Test if 1 condition does not match
description.full: Test if none of {count} conditions match

description.picker: If the numeric value of an entity''s state (or attribute''s value) is above or below a given threshold.
Test if any condition is true.
If an entity (or attribute) is in a specific state.
If the sun is above or below the horizon.
If a template evaluates to true.
description.full: Test if template renders a value equal to true

description.picker: If the current time is before or after a specified time.
If the automation has been triggered by a specific trigger.
description.full: When triggered by {id}

description.picker: If someone (or something) is in a zone.

actions.name: Actions
actions.description: This list of actions will be performed in sequence when the automation runs. An action usually controls one of your areas, devices, or entities, for example: 'Turn on the lights'. You can use building blocks to create more complex sequences of actions.
actions.unsupported_action: Ni podpore za UI za dejanje: {action}

building_blocks.label: Building blocks
building_blocks.description: Build more complex sequences of actions.

service.label: Kliči storitev
service.has_optional_response: This service can return a response, if you want to use the response, enter the name of a variable the response will be saved in
service.has_response: This service returns a response, enter the name of a variable the response will be saved in

description.service_based_on_template: Call a service based on a template on {targets}

description.picker: Play media on a media player.
Wait some time to perform a sequence of actions.
description.full: Delay {duration}

description.picker: Wait for a template to be evaluated to true to perform a sequence of actions.
description.full: Wait for a template to evaluate to true

description.picker: Wait for a trigger to perform a sequence of actions.
Test a condition (and stop the sequence if the condition is not met).
Fire an event manually (event is an advanced concept in NDX Tech).
description.full: Manually fire event {name}

description.picker: Do something on a device. Great way to start.
Repeat a sequence of actions.
description.full: Repeat an action {chosenAction}

choose.label: Izberite

description.picker: Choose what to do based on conditions (Similar to If-Then, but more powerful).
Do something conditionally.
description.if_else: Conditionally execute an action and default to another action

stop.label: Zaustavitev
stop.response_variable: The name of the variable to use as response

description.picker: Stop the sequence of actions.
Perform a sequence of actions in parallel.
Define variables to be used later in the sequence.
description.full: Define variables {names}
Test {condition}

description.picker: Set response of conversation when automation was triggered by conversation trigger.
description.full: Set response of conversation to {response}

re_order_mode.description_actions: Ste v načinu preurejanja, lahko preuredite svoja dejanja.
re_order_mode.description_conditions: Ste v načinu ponovnega urejanja, na novo lahko preuredite svoje pogoje.
re_order_mode.description_triggers: Ste v načinu preurejanja, lahko preuredite sprožilce.
re_order_mode.title: Način urejanja vrstnega reda

path.choose: Select a step on the left for more information.
path.default_action_executed: The default action was executed because no options matched.
path.no_further_execution: This step was not executed and so no further trace information is available.
path.disabled_step: This step was disabled and skipped during execution so no further trace information is available.
path.no_logbook_entries: No Logbook entries found for this step.

overview.introduction: Konfiguracija načrta omogoča uvažanje in urejanje načrtov.
overview.blueprint_in_use_title: This blueprint is in use and can not be deleted
overview.blueprint_in_use_text: Please remove all below {type} that use this blueprint before deleting it. {list}
overview.share_blueprint_no_url: Unable to share blueprint: no source URL
overview.re_import_blueprint_no_url: Unable to re-import blueprint: no source URL
overview.re_import_confirm_text: Importing it will override the existing blueprint. If the updated blueprint is not compatible, it can break your automations. Automations will have to be adjusted manually.
overview.re_import_error_source_not_found: Unable to re-import the blueprint: source not found.

add.import_introduction: Import blueprints of other users from GitHub and the community forums by pasting the address below.
add.override_description: Importing it will override the existing blueprint. If the updated blueprint is not compatible, it can break your automations. Automations will have to be adjusted manually.

picker.introduction: Urejevalnik skript vam omogoča njihovo ustvarjanje in urejanje. Upoštevajte spodnjo povezavo in si preberite navodila, da se prepričate, da ste pravilno konfigurirali Home Assistant-a.
picker.empty_text: A script is a sequence of actions that can be run from a dashboard, an automation, or be triggered by voice. For example, a ''Wake-up routine''' script that gradually turns on the light in the bedroom and opens the blinds after a delay.

dialog_new.create_empty_description: Začnite s prazno skripto od začetka

editor.id_already_exists_save_error: Te skripte ne morete shraniti, ker ID ni edinstven, izberite drug ID ali ga pustite prazno, da ga samodejno ustvari.
editor.introduction: Uporabite skripte za izvajanje zaporedij dejanj.
editor.read_only: Te skripte ni mogoče spremeniti v uporabniškem omrežju, ker ni shranjena v datoteki "scripts.yaml".

field.name: Name
field.key_not_null: The field key must not be empty.
field.key_not_unique: The field key must not be the same value as another field.

editor.load_error_not_editable: Urejati je mogoče le skripte znotraj scripts.yaml.
editor.load_error_not_deletable: Only scripts in scripts.yaml can be deleted.

scene.caption: Scene
scene.description: Shranite stanje naprav in jih spet prikličite kasneje

picker.introduction: Urejevalnik scen vam omogoča njihovo ustvarjanje in urejanje. Upoštevajte spodnjo povezavo in si preberite navodila, da se prepričate, da ste pravilno konfigurirali Home Assistant.
picker.only_editable: Urejajo se lahko samo scene, definirane v scenes.yaml.
picker.empty_text: Scenes capture entities' states, so you can re-experience the same scene later on. For example, a ''Watching TV'' scene that dims the living room lights, sets a warm white color and turns on the TV.

editor.load_error_not_editable: Urejajo se lahko samo scene v scene.yaml.
editor.name: Naziv

devices.introduction: Dodajte naprave, ki jih želite vključiti v sceno. Nastavite vse entitete in naprave na stanje, ki ga želite za to sceno

cloud.description_features: Imejte nadzor nad domom tudi, ko vas ni doma, povežite z Alexa in Google Asistentom.

login.title: Prijava v oblak
login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud vam tudi takrat, ko vas ni doma zagotavlja varno oddaljeno povezavo do vašega Home Assistant-a. Prav tako vam omogoča, da se povežete z ostalimi oblačnimi storitvami Amazon Alexa in Google Assistant.
login.introduction2a: , podjetje, ki so ga ustanovili ustanovitelji Home Assistant-a.
login.introduction3: Home Assistant Cloud je naročniška storitev z enomesečno brezplačno poizkusno dobo. Podatki o plačilnih karticah niso potrebni.
login.learn_more_link: Preberite več o Home Assistant Cloud-u
login.password_error_msg: Gesla morajo biti dolga vsaj 8 znakov
login.alert_email_confirm_necessary: Pred prijavo morate potrditi svojo e-pošto.
login.cloud_pipeline_title: Want to use NDX Tech Cloud for your voice assistant?
login.cloud_pipeline_text: We created a new assistant for you, using the superior text-to-speech and speech-to-text engines from NDX Tech Cloud. Would you like to set this assistant as the preferred assistant?

forgot_password.title: Pozabljeno geslo
forgot_password.subtitle: Ste pozabili geslo
forgot_password.instructions: Vnesite svoj e-poštni naslov in poslali vam bomo povezavo za ponastavitev gesla.
forgot_password.check_your_email: Preverite vaš e-poštni za navodila za ponastavitev gesla.

register.title: Registrirajte račun
register.headline: Začnite brezplačno preskusno različico
register.information: Ustvarite račun, če želite začeti brezplačno enomesečno preskušanje Home Assistant Cloud-a. Podatki o plačilu niso potrebni.
register.information2: Preizkus vam bo omogočil dostop do vseh prednosti Home Assistant Cloud, vključno z:
register.feature_webhook_apps: Enostavna integracija s spletnimi aplikacijami, kot je OwnTracks
register.information3a: , podjetje, ki so ga ustanovili ustanovitelji Home Assistant-a.
register.information4: Z registracijo računa se strinjate z naslednjimi pravili in pogoji.
register.password_error_msg: Gesla morajo biti dolga vsaj 8 znakov
register.account_created: Račun ustvarjen! Preverite vašo e-pošto za navodila o tem, kako aktivirate vaš račun.

account.thank_you_note: Zahvaljujemo se vam za to, da ste del Home Assistant Cloud-a. Zaradi ljudi, kot ste vi, smo sposobni narediti dobro izkušnjo avtomatizacije doma za vsakogar. hvala!
account.integrations_introduction: Integracija za Home Assistant Cloud vam omogoča povezovanje s storitvami v oblaku, ne da bi vam bilo treba Home Assistant javno izpostavljati po internetu.
account.tip_moved_voice_assistants: Iščete nastavitve za Google Assistant in Amazon Alexa? Premaknjene so na novo stran glasovnih pomočnikov.

tts.title: Besedilo v govor
tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our text-to-speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.

dialog.example_message: Pozdravljeni, {name} , poljubno besedilo lahko predvajate na katerem koli podprtem predvajalniku medijev!

remote.title: Oddaljeno upravljanje
remote.reconnecting: Brez povezave. Poskušam ponovno vzpostaviti povezavo.
remote.access_is_being_prepared: Oddaljeni dostop se pripravlja. Obvestili vas bomo, ko bo pripravljen.
remote.cerificate_loaded: Vaše potrdilo je naloženo in čaka na potrditev.
remote.cerificate_error: There was an error generating the certificate, check your logs.
remote.info: Home Assistant Cloud zagotavlja varno oddaljeno povezavo do vašega primerka, medtem ko ste zunaj doma.
remote.instance_is_available: Vaš primerek je na voljo na
remote.instance_will_be_available: Vaš primerek bo na voljo na

alexa.title: Alexa
alexa.info: Z integracijo Alexa za Home Assistant cloud boste lahko nadzirali vse svoje naprave s pomočjo katere koli naprave, ki podpira Alexa.
alexa.enable_ha_skill: Omogoči Home Assistant spretnost za Alexo
alexa.info_state_reporting: Če omogočite poročanje o stanju, bo Home Assistant Amazonu poslal vse spremembe stanja izpostavljenih entitet. To vam omogoča, da vedno vidite najnovejša stanja v aplikaciji Alexa.
alexa.manual_config: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
alexa.not_configured_text: Pred uporabo Alexe morate v aplikaciji Alexa aktivirati spretnost Home Assistant.
alexa.expose_new_entities_info: Should new entities be exposed to Alexa automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.

google.title: Pomočnik Google
google.info: Z integracijo Pomočnik Google za Home Assistant cloud boste lahko nadzirali vse svoje naprave s pomočjo katere koli naprave, ki ga podpirajo.
google.http_use_ssl_warning_text: Google napravam je lokalna komunikacija z Home Assistantom onemogočena zaradi uporabe SSL certifikata v HTTP integraciji.
google.enable_ha_skill: Aktivacija spretnosti Home Assistant Cloud za Google Assistant
google.info_state_reporting: Če omogočite poročanje o stanju, bo Home Assistant Googlu poslal vse spremembe stanja izpostavljenih entitet. To vam omogoča, da vedno vidite najnovejša stanja v aplikaciji Google.
google.enter_pin_info: Prosimo vnesite kodo pin za interakcijo z varnostnimi napravami. Varnostne naprave so vrata, garažna vrata in ključavnice. Med interakcijo s takšnimi napravami prek Googlovega pomočnika boste morali povedati / vnesti ta pin.
google.enter_pin_hint: Vnesite kodo PIN za uporabo varnostnih naprav
google.manual_config: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
google.not_configured_text: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the NDX Tech Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
google.expose_new_entities_info: Ali naj bodo nove entitete, ki so podprte in nimajo nobenih varnostnih tveganj, samodejno izpostavljene Pomočniku Google?

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.info: Vsemu, kar je nastavljeno tako, da se sproži webhook je mogoče dati javno dostopen URL, kar jim omogoča, pošljanje podatkov nazaj na Home Assistant od kjerkoli, ne da bi izpostavili vaš primerek na internetu.
webhooks.no_hooks_yet: Izgleda, da še nimate webhooks-ov. Začnite s konfiguracijo
webhooks.link_learn_more: Preberite več o ustvarjanju avtomatizacij, ki jih poganjajo webhook-i.

dialog_cloudhook.managed_by_integration: Ta webhook upravlja integracija in je ni mogoče onemogočiti.
dialog_cloudhook.info_disable_webhook: Če ne želite več uporabljati tega webhook-a, ga lahko

devices.add_prompt: {name} še niso bile dodane za {type}. Lahko jih dodaš s klikom na gumb + spodaj.
devices.caption: Naprave
devices.name: Naziv
devices.enabled_description: Onemogočene naprave ne bodo prikazane, entitete, ki pripadajo napravi, pa bodo onemogočene in ne bodo dodane v Home Assistant.

automation.create_disable: Z onemogočenim {type} ni mogoče ustvariti avtomatizacije
automation.no_device_automations: Za to napravo ni na voljo nobenih avtomatizacij.

script.create_disable: Z onemogočenim {type} ni mogoče ustvariti skripta

scene.create_disable: Z onemogočenim {type} ni mogoče ustvariti scene

devices.cant_edit: Urejate lahko samo elemente, ki so ustvarjeni v uporabniškem vmesniku.
devices.device_not_found: Naprave / storitve ni bilo mogoče najti
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids: Ali želite tudi preimenovati ID-je entitet?
devices.confirm_rename_entity_ids_warning: To ne bo spremenilo nobene konfiguracije (kot so avtomatizacije, skripti, prizori, nadzorne plošče), ki trenutno uporabljajo te entitete! Sami jih boste morali posodobiti, da boste uporabili nove ID-je entitet!
devices.confirm_disable_config_entry: There are no more devices for the config entry {entry_name}, do you want to instead disable the config entry?
devices.confirm_delete: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti to napravo?
devices.confirm_delete_integration: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti to napravo iz {integration}?

picker.introduction: Home Assistant vodi register vseh entitet, ki jih je kdajkoli videl in jih je mogoče enolično identificirati. Vsak od teh entitet ima dodeljen ID entitete, ki bo rezerviran samo za to entiteto.
picker.introduction2: Z registrom entitet lahko nadomestite ime, spremenite ID entitete ali odstranite vnos iz programa Home Assistant.

enable_selected.confirm_text: Naprave bodo znova na voljo v  Home Assistant-u, če so zdaj onemogočene.

disable_selected.confirm_text: Onemogočene entitete ne bodo dodane v Home Assistant.

remove_selected.confirm_text: Če vsebujejo te entitete, bi jih morali odstraniti iz vašega Lovelace config-a in avtomatizacije.
remove_selected.confirm_partly_text: Lahko odstranite le {removable} izbranih {selected} entitet. Entitete je mogoče odstraniti le, če integracija ne zagotavlja več entitet. Včasih morate znova zagnati Home Assistant, preden lahko odstranite entitete odstranjene integracije. Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti odstranljive entitete?

hide_selected.confirm_text: Skrite entitete ne bodo prikazane na vaših nadzornih ploščah. Njihova zgodovina se še vedno spremlja in še vedno lahko upravljate z njimi preko servisov.

person.caption: Osebe
person.description: Upravljanje oseb, ki jim sledi Home Assistant.
person.introduction: Tu lahko dodate željene osebe v Home Assistant.
person.note_about_persons_configured_in_yaml: Oseb, konfiguriranih prek configuration.yaml, ni mogoče urejati prek uporabniškega vmesnika.
person.no_persons_created_yet: Videti je, da še niste dodali nobene osebe.
person.confirm_delete_text: This person will be permanently deleted and all devices belonging to this person will become unassigned.
person.person_not_found: Nismo našli osebe, ki ste jo poskušali urediti.

detail.name: Naziv
detail.device_tracker_intro: Izberite naprave, ki pripadajo tej osebi.
detail.no_device_tracker_available_intro: Ko imate naprave, ki kažejo na prisotnost osebe, jih boste lahko tukaj dodelili osebi. Svojo prvo napravo lahko dodate tako, da na strani z integracijami dodate zaznavanje prisotnosti.
detail.confirm_delete_user: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati uporabniški račun za {name}? Uporabnika lahko še vedno spremljate, vendar se oseba ne bo več mogla prijaviti.
detail.local_only: Prijava je mogoča samo iz lokalnega omrežja

zone.caption: Cone
zone.description: Upravljajte cone, v katerih želite slediti osebam.
zone.introduction: Cone omogočajo določitev določenih regij na Zemlji. Ko je oseba znotraj te cone, bo stanje prevzelo ime cone. Cone se lahko uporabljajo tudi kot sprožilec ali pogoj pri avtomatizacijah.
zone.no_zones_created_yet: Kaže, da niste ustvarili še nobene cone.
zone.confirm_delete: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati to cono?
zone.configured_in_yaml: Con, ki so konfigurirane preko config.yaml, ni mogoče urejati z uporabniškim vmesnikom.
zone.edit_home_zone: Polmera domače cone še ni mogoče urejati v uporabniškem vmesniku. Če želite premakniti domačo cono, povlecite oznako na zemljevidu.
zone.edit_home_zone_narrow: Polmera domače cone še ni mogoče urejati iz uporabniškega vmesnika. Lokacijo lahko spremenite iz splošne konfiguracije.
zone.home_zone_core_config: Lokacijo domače cone je mogoče urejati na strani splošne konfiguracije. Polmera domače cone še ni mogoče urejati iz uporabniškega vmesnika. Ali želite iti na splošno konfiguracijo?

detail.name: Naziv
detail.icon_error_msg: Ikona mora biti v obliki "predpona:ime" ikone, na primer: "mdi:home"
detail.passive_note: Pasivne cone so skrite v uporabniškem vmesniku in jih ne uporabljamo za sledenje napravam. Koristne so, če jih želite uporabiti samo za avtomatizacijo.

integrations.caption: Integracije
integrations.description: Upravljanje integracij s storitvami ali napravami
integrations.no_integrations: Zdi se, da še nimate nobenih konfiguracij. Kliknite na spodnji gumb, da dodate svojo prvo integracijo!
integrations.note_about_integrations: Iskanje neuspešno, želene integracije mogoče še ni možno konfigurirati prek uporabniškega vmesnika.
integrations.note_about_website_reference: Več jih je na voljo prek
integrations.what_device_type: What type of device is it?
integrations.what_to_add: What do you want to add?
integrations.confirm_add_discovered: Want to add these discovered devices?

ignore.confirm_ignore: Ali ste prepričani, da ne želite nastaviti te integracije? To lahko razveljavite s klikom na 'Prikaži prezrte integracije' v prelivnem meniju v zgornjem desnem kotu.
ignore.confirm_delete_ignore: Zaradi tega bo integracija spet prikazana v vaših odkritih integracijah, ko bodo odkrite. To lahko zahteva ponovni zagon ali traja nekaj časa.

application_credentials.delete_prompt: Would you like to also remove Application Credentials for this integration?
application_credentials.delete_detail: If you remove them, you will need to enter credentials when setting up the integration again. If you keep them, they will be used automatically when setting up the integration again or may be acccessed from the Application Credentials menu.

config_entry.delete_confirm_text: Its devices and entities will be permanently deleted.
config_entry.restart_confirm: Znova zaženite Home Assistant, da dokončate odstranitev te integracije
config_entry.reload_restart_confirm: Znova zaženi Home Assistant, da dokončate ponovno nalaganje te integracije
config_entry.disable_restart_confirm: Znova zaženite Home Assistant, da dokončate onemogočanje te integracije
config_entry.enable_restart_confirm: Znova zaženite Home Assistant, da dokončate omogočanje te integracije
config_entry.disable_confirm_text: Its devices and entities will be disabled.
config_entry.disable_error: Omogočanje ali onemogočanje integracije ni uspelo
config_entry.disabled_polling: Samodejno spraševanje za posodobljene podatke je onemogočeno

config_flow.yaml_only_title: This device cannot be added from the UI
config_flow.yaml_only: To napravo lahko dodate tako, da jo dodate v svoj ''configuration.yaml''. Za več informacij si oglejte dokumentacijo.
config_flow.no_config_flow: Ta integracija ne podpira konfiguracije prek uporabniškega vmesnika. Če ste sledili tej povezavi s spletnega mesta Home Assistant, se prepričajte, da uporabljate najnovejšo različico Home Assistant.

external_step.description: Ta korak zahteva, da za končanje obiščete zunanjo spletno stran.

loading.loading_flow: Prosimo, počakajte, dokler se {integration} ne nastavi

config_flow.not_loaded: Integracije ni mogoče naložiti, poskusite ponovno zagnati Homeassistant.
config_flow.supported_brand_flow: Podporo za naprave {supported_brand} zagotavlja {flow_domain_name}. Želite nadaljevati?
config_flow.missing_zwave_zigbee: Če želite dodati napravo {brand}, najprej potrebujete {supported_hardware_link} in nastavite integracijo {integration}. Če že imate strojno opremo, lahko nadaljujete z nastavitvijo {integration}.
config_flow.missing_matter: To add a {brand} device, you first need the {integration} integration and {supported_hardware_link}. Do you want to proceed with the setup of {integration}?
config_flow.matter_mobile_app: You need to use the NDX Tech Companion app on your mobile phone to commission Matter devices.

users.caption: Uporabniki
users.users_privileges_note: Zmožnosti skupin uporabnikov so delo v teku. Uporabnik ne bo mogel upravljati primerka prek uporabniškega vmesnika. Še vedno poteka revidiranje vseh končnih točk API-ja za upravljanje, da zagotovimo pravilno omejevanje dostopa do administratorjev.

editor.caption: Prikaži uporabnika
editor.name: Ime
editor.local_only: Prijava je mogoča samo iz lokalnega omrežja
editor.active_tooltip: Nadozruje, ali se lahko uporabnik prijavi

application_credentials.caption: Prijavni podatki aplikacij
application_credentials.description: Upravljanje OAuth prijavnih podatkov za integracije

editor.caption: Dodaj prijavne podatke
editor.description: OAuth is used to grant NDX Tech access to information on other websites without giving a passwords. This mechanism is used by companies such as Spotify, Google, Withings, Microsoft, and Twitter.
editor.name: Naziv

remove_selected.confirm_text: Prijavnih podatkov, ki so v uporabi, ni mogoče odstraniti.

mqtt.title: MQTT
mqtt.subscribe_to: Tema, na katero se lahko naročite

thread.no_preferred_network: You don't have a preferred network yet.
thread.default_router_not_found: The border router used for Android + iOS credentials for this network could not be found.
thread.set_default_router: Use router for Android + iOS credentials
thread.no_routers_otbr_network: No border routers were found. Check your border router is configured correctly or reset it to factory settings.
thread.confirm_reset_border_router_text: NDX Tech will create a new Thread network. Any devices that are currently joined on this NDX Tech Thread network will need to be re-joined.
thread.confirm_set_dataset_border_router_text: NDX Tech will join an existing Thread network. Any devices that are currently joined on this NDX Tech Thread network will need to be re-joined.
thread.otbr_config_failed: Failed to configure the border router
thread.confirm_delete_dataset_text: To omrežje bo odstranjeno iz Home Assistant.
thread.change_channel_initiated_text: The channel change has been initiated and will complete in {delay} minutes.
thread.change_channel_multiprotocol_enabled_tit: The Thread radio has multiprotocol enabled
thread.change_channel_multiprotocol_enabled_tex: To change channel when the Thread radio has multiprotocol enabled, please use the hardware settings menu.
thread.change_channel_range: Channel must be in the range 11 to 26
thread.change_channel_text: Initiating a channel change for your NDX Tech Thread network should be performed with caution. Some Thread devices may not migrate to the new channel automatically and, if the new channel is congested, your Thread devices may become intermittently unavailable. Some devices may need to be manually re-joined to your Thread network before they show in NDX Tech again. This action cannot be reversed (without performing another channel change).

channel_dialog.title: Multiprotocol addon in use
channel_dialog.text: Zigbee and Thread share the same radio and must use the same channel. Change the channel of both networks by reconfiguring multiprotocol from the hardware menu.

add_device_page.pairing_mode: Prepričajte se, da so vaše naprave v načinu združevanja. Preverite navodila svoje naprave, kako to storiti.
add_device_page.discovered_text: Naprave se bodo prikazale tukaj, ko jih odkrijemo.
add_device_page.no_devices_found: Nobene naprave ni bilo mogoče najti, preverite, da so v stanju uparjanja in budne, medtem ko je odkrivanje v teku.

clusters.help_cluster_dropdown: Izberite gručo, če si želite ogledati njene atribute in ukaze.

cluster_attributes.introduction: Oglejte si atribute gruče in jih uredite.

cluster_commands.introduction: Oglejte si in izdajte ukaze gruče.

groups.caption: Skupine
groups.group_details: Tu so vse podrobnosti za izbrano skupino Zigbee.
groups.create_group_details: Da ustvarite novo skupino Zigbee vnesite zahtevane podrobnosti.

group_binding.group_picker_help: Izberite skupino, ki bo izdala ukaz vezanja.
group_binding.cluster_selection_help: Izberite gruče, ki se vežejo na izbrano skupino.
group_binding.bind_button_help: Povežite izbrano skupino z izbranimi gručami naprave.
group_binding.unbind_button_help: Odvežite izbrano skupino iz izbranih gruč naprav.

change_channel_dialog.title: Change network channel
change_channel_dialog.migration_warning: Zigbee channel migration is an experimental feature and relies on devices on your network to support it. Device support for this feature varies and only a portion of your network may end up migrating!
change_channel_dialog.devices_will_rejoin: Devices will re-join the network over time. This may take a few minutes.

messages_tx.label: Messages TX
messages_tx.tooltip: Number of messages successfully sent to the controller

messages_rx.label: Messages RX
messages_rx.tooltip: Number of messages successfully received by the controller

messages_dropped_tx.label: Dropped messages TX
messages_dropped_tx.tooltip: Number of messages from the controller that were dropped by the host

messages_dropped_rx.label: Dropped messages RX
messages_dropped_rx.tooltip: Number of outgoing messages that were dropped because they could not be sent

nak.label: NAK
nak.tooltip: Number of messages that the controller did not accept

can.label: CAN
can.tooltip: Number of collisions while sending a message to the controller

timeout_ack.label: Timeout ACK
timeout_ack.tooltip: Number of transmission attempts where an ACK was missing from the controller

timeout_response.label: Timeout response
timeout_response.tooltip: Number of transmission attempts where the controller response did not come in time

timeout_callback.label: Timeout callback
timeout_callback.tooltip: Number of transmission attempts where the controller callback did not come in time

dashboard.introduction: Upravljanje omrežja Z-Wave in naprav Z-Wave

device_info.custom_device_config: This device is using a custom device config file not provided by Z-Wave JS. If you want to use the default device config provided by Z-Wave JS, you must remove the custom device config file from the folder that Z-Wave JS is reading from.

NotStarted.title: Reset Controller to Factory Settings
NotStarted.body: If you decide to move forward, you will reset your controller to factory settings. As a result, the controller will forget all devices it is paired with and all Z-Wave devices for this network will be removed from NDX Tech. If there are any devices still paired with the controller when it is reset, they will have to go through the exclusion process before they can be re-paired. Would you like to continue?

InProgress.title: Resetting Controller
InProgress.body: Your controller is being reset and restarted. Wait until the process is complete before closing this dialog

Done.title: Controller Reset Complete
Done.body: Your controller has been reset to factory settings and has been restarted! You can now close this dialog.

hard_reset_controller.confirmation: This action cannot be undone unless you have an NVM backup from your controller.

commands_tx.label: Commands TX
commands_tx.tooltip: # of commands successfully sent to the node

commands_rx.label: Commands RX
commands_rx.tooltip: # of commands received from the node, including responses to sent commands

commands_dropped_tx.label: Commands dropped TX
commands_dropped_tx.tooltip: # of outgoing commands that were dropped because they could not be sent

commands_dropped_rx.label: Commands dropped RX
commands_dropped_rx.tooltip: # of commands from the node that were dropped by the host

timeout_response.label: Timeout response
timeout_response.tooltip: # of Get-type commands where the node's response did not come in time

rtt.label: RTT
rtt.tooltip: Average round-trip-time in ms of commands to this node

rssi.label: RSSI
rssi.tooltip: Average RSSI in dBm of frames received by this node

data_rate.label: Hitrost prenosa podatkov
data_rate.tooltip: The used data rate for this route

repeaters.label: Ponavljalniki + RSSI
repeaters.tooltip: Katera vozlišča so ponavljalniki za to pot in njihov RSSI

rssi.label: RSSI
rssi.tooltip: The RSSI of the ACK frame received by the controller

route_failed_between.label: Neuspešna pot med
route_failed_between.tooltip: Vozlišča, med katerimi je bil prenos nazadnje neuspešen

node_config.introduction: Upravljajte in prilagajajte specifične konfiguracijske parametre za izbrano napravo
node_config.attribution: Konfiguracijske parametre in opise naprave zagotavlja {device_database}
node_config.battery_device_notice: Battery devices must be awake to update their config. Please refer to your device manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
node_config.set_param_queued: Sprememba parametra je bila uvrščena v čakalno vrsto in bo posodobljena, ko se naprava zbudi.

add_node.title: Dodajte napravo Z-Wave
add_node.follow_device_instructions: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger pairing on the device.
add_node.qr_code_paragraph: Če vaša naprava podpira SmartStart, lahko skenirate QR kodo za enostavno seznanjanje.
add_node.provisioning_finished: Naprava je bila dodana. Ko jo vklopite, bo na voljo.
add_node.interview_started: Naprava je v intervjuju. To lahko traja nekaj časa.
add_node.interview_failed: Intervju z napravo ni uspel. Dodatne informacije so lahko na voljo v dnevnikih.

provisioned.confirm_unprovision_title: Ali ste prepričani, da želite preklicati uporabo naprave?
provisioned.confirm_unprovision_text: Če napravo odjavite, ne bo dodana v Home Assistant, ko jo vklopite. Če je naprava že dodana v program Home Assistant, je z odstranitvijo naprave, ki je bila dodana, ne boste odstranili iz programa Home Assistant.

S2_Unauthenticated.title: S2 Ne-overjeno
S2_Unauthenticated.description: Podobno kot S2 overjeno, vendar brez preverjanja, ali je vključena prava naprava.

S2_Authenticated.title: S2 overjeno
S2_Authenticated.description: Primer: razsvetljava, senzorji in varnostni sistemi

S0_Legacy.title: S0 Zapuščina
S0_Legacy.description: Primer: stare ključavnice vrat brez podpore S2

remove_node.title: Odstrani Z-Wave napravo
remove_node.introduction: Odstranite napravo iz omrežja Z-Wave ter odstranite povezano napravo in entitete iz Home Assistant.
remove_node.controller_in_exclusion_mode: Vaš krmilnik Z-Wave je zdaj v načinu izključitve.
remove_node.follow_device_instructions: Sledite navodilom, ki ste jih dobili z napravo, da sprožite izključitev v napravi.
remove_node.exclusion_failed: Naprave ni bilo mogoče odstraniti. Za več informacij preverite dnevnike.
remove_node.exclusion_finished: Naprava {id} je bila odstranjena iz vašega Z-Wave omrežja.

remove_failed_node.title: Odstranite nedelujočo napravo Z-Wave
remove_failed_node.introduction: Odstranite nedelujočo napravo iz omrežja Z-Wave. To uporabite, če naprave ne morete normalno izključiti, ker je pokvarjena.
remove_failed_node.removal_finished: Vozlišče {id} je bilo odstranjeno iz vašega Z-Wave omrežja.
remove_failed_node.removal_failed: Naprave ni bilo mogoče odstraniti iz vašega omrežja Z-Wave.

reinterview_node.title: Ponovni intervju z napravo Z-Wave
reinterview_node.introduction: Ponovni intervju z napravo v omrežju Z-Wave. To funkcijo uporabite, če ima vaša naprava neustrezne ali nepravilne funkcionalnosti.
reinterview_node.battery_device_warning: Pred začetkom ponovnega intervjuja boste morali zbuditi naprave, ki se napajajo z baterijami. Za navodila o tem, kako prebuditi napravo, glejte priročnik za napravo.
reinterview_node.run_in_background: To pogovorno okno lahko zaprete in intervju se bo nadaljeval v ozadju.
reinterview_node.in_progress: Naprava je v intervjuju. To lahko traja nekaj časa.
reinterview_node.interview_failed: Intervju z napravo je bil neuspešen. Dodatne informacije so lahko na voljo v dnevnikih.

rebuild_network_routes.title: Rebuild routes for your Z-Wave network
rebuild_network_routes.introduction: Start rebuilding routes on your Z-Wave network. Rebuilding routes will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
rebuild_network_routes.traffic_warning: The rebuilding process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the rebuild is in progress.
rebuild_network_routes.in_progress: Rebuild of network routes is in progress. This will take some time.
rebuild_network_routes.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the rebuild of network routes will continue in the background.
rebuild_network_routes.rebuilding_routes_failed: Route rebuilding failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
rebuild_network_routes.rebuilding_routes_cancelled: Rebuilding network routes has been cancelled.

rebuild_node_routes.title: Rebuild routes for a Z-Wave device
rebuild_node_routes.introduction: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
rebuild_node_routes.traffic_warning: The route rebuilding process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the rebuilding is in progress.
rebuild_node_routes.rebuilding_routes_failed_check_logs: Additional information may be available in the logs.
rebuild_node_routes.routes_rebuild_in_progress: A Z-Wave routes rebuild is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before rebuilding routes for an individual device.

update_firmware.title: Update device firmware
update_firmware.warning: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The NDX Tech and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?
update_firmware.warning_controller: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your controller if you do not use the right firmware files, or if you attempt to stop the firmware update before it completes. The NDX Tech and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your controller as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your controller. Would you still like to continue?
update_firmware.introduction: Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
update_firmware.introduction_controller: Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}. Note that once you start a firmware update, you MUST wait for the update to complete.
update_firmware.firmware_target_intro: Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update.
update_firmware.queued: The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
update_firmware.close_queued: If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
update_firmware.awake: The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
update_firmware.close: If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
update_firmware.in_progress: The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
update_firmware.confirm_abort: Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?

finished_status.try_again: To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
finished_status.done: The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
finished_status.done_controller: The firmware update is complete! Your controller is being restarted and your network will temporarily be unavailable.

logs.title: Dnevniki Z-Wave JS
logs.subscribed_to_logs: Subscribed to Z-Wave JS log messages…

manage_fabrics.title: Connected fabrics
manage_fabrics.fabrics: Manage the fabrics that have access to this device.
manage_fabrics.remove_fabric_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to remove the {fabric} from the device? You will not be able to control/access the device from that ecosystem/fabric after this action!
manage_fabrics.remove_fabric_failed_text: The action did not succeed, check the logs for more information.

reinterview_node.title: Re-interview a Matter device
reinterview_node.introduction: Perform a full re-interview of a Matter device. Use this feature only if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
reinterview_node.battery_device_warning: You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
reinterview_node.run_in_background: You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
reinterview_node.in_progress: The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
reinterview_node.interview_failed: The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

ping_node.title: Ping a Matter device
ping_node.introduction: Perform a (server-side) ping on your Matter device on all its (known) IP-addresses.
ping_node.battery_device_warning: Note that especially for battery powered devices this can take a a while. You may need to up powered devices before starting the pinging to speed up the process. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
ping_node.in_progress: The device is being pinged. This may take some time.
ping_node.ping_failed: The device ping failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.

open_commissioning_window.title: Share device
open_commissioning_window.introduction: Enable commissioning mode on the device to pair it to another Matter controller.
open_commissioning_window.in_progress: We're communicating with the device. This may take some time.
open_commissioning_window.failed: The command failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
open_commissioning_window.success: Your device can now be added to another Matter controller, scan the QR code below or enter the sharing code in the app of the controller you want to add your device to.

tips.media_storage: You can add network storage to your NDX Tech instance in the {storage} panel.

analytics.caption: Analitika
analytics.description: Kako deliti svoje podatke, da bi izboljšali Homeassistant

base.title: Basic analytics
base.description: This includes information about your system.

usage.title: Uporaba
usage.description: Podrobnosti o tem, kaj uporabljate s Home Assistant

statistics.title: Statistični podatki
statistics.description: Counts containing total number of datapoints.

diagnostics.title: Diagnostika
diagnostics.description: Share crash reports when unexpected errors occur.

analytics.need_base_enabled: You need to enable basic analytics for this option to be available
analytics.intro: Share anonymized information from your installation to help make NDX Tech better and help us convince manufacturers to add local control and privacy-focused features.

network.caption: Omrežje

supervisor.title: Uredi mrežne vmesnike
supervisor.warning: Če spreminjate Wi-Fi, IP naslov ali naslov prehoda, lahko izgubite povezavo!
supervisor.unsaved: Imate neshranjene spremembe, ki bodo izgubljene, če preklopite med zavihki. Želite nadaljevati?

hostname.title: Naziv gostitelja
hostname.description: Ime, ki ga bo imela vaša namestitev v vašem omrežju

network.network_adapter_info: Konfigurirajte, katere omrežne kartice bodo uporabljale integracije. Trenutno ta nastavitev vpliva samo na multicast promet. Za uveljavitev teh nastavitev je potreben ponovni zagon.

datadisk.title: Premakni podatkovni disk
datadisk.description: Trenutno uporabljate '' {current_path} '' kot podatkovni disk. Premikanje podatkovnih diskov bo znova zagnalo vašo napravo, kar bo trajalo predvidoma {time} minut. Vaša namestitev Home Assistant v tem obdobju ne bo dostopna. Med selitvijo ne izključite napajanja!
datadisk.no_devices_text: There is no suitable external device found. The storage capacity of the external data disk must be larger than the storage capacity of the existing disk.
datadisk.moving_desc: Ponovni zagon in premikanje podatkovnega diska. Prosimo za potrpežljivost

not_supported.title: The operating system does not support network storage
not_supported.supervised: Network storage is not supported on this host
not_supported.os: To use network storage you need to run at least NDX Tech Operating System {version}

name.title: Ime
name.description: To ime vam bo prikazano v uporabniškem vmesniku in bo tudi ime mape, ustvarjene v vašem sistemu

share.title: Remote share
share.description: This is the name of the share you created on your storage server

server.title: Strežnik
server.description: This is the domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the storage server you want to connect to

default_backup_mount.title: Default backup location
default_backup_mount.description: This will be the default location for backups

path.title: Remote share path
path.description: This is the path of the remote share on your storage server

type.title: Protokol
type.description: This determines how to communicate with the storage server

usage.title: Uporaba
usage.description: To določa, kako naj bi se delitev uporabljala

version.title: Samba/Windows (CIFS) version
version.description: This choses the version of the protocol to use

username.title: Uporabniško ime
username.description: This is your username for the samba share

password.title: Geslo
password.description: This is your password for the samba share

errors.invalid_name: Invalid name, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores

warnings.not_recomeded_cifs_version: The selected CIFS version is not recommended to use, you should only use this if you have problems with auto and your server does not support version 2.1 or newer

system_health.caption: Zdravje sistema
system_health.description: Status, metrike in zagonski časi integracij
